price: 108. Maalintaas waxay iyagu (qof walbaa) raaci (dhawaaqa) dhawaaqaha isagoon leexleexasho lahayn. Waxayna ahaan codadka oo dhan kuwo kushuucsan Raxmaanka (Alle) horti, mana maqleysid waxaan aheyn shanqarta (socodkooda).
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِيَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yattabiʿūna al-dāʿiya lā ʿiwaja lahu wakhashaʿati al-aṣwātu lilrraḥmāni falā tasmaʿu illā hamsan
